DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effectiveness and safety of Olostar Tab in patients with essential hypertension and dyslipidemia
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Investigate the Effectiveness and Safety of Olostar Tab in Patients With Essential Hypertension and Dyslipidemia
